trans-unit.source: Indicates that a class can use a markup extension to provide a value, and references a handler to use for markup extension set operations.
trans-unit.target: 表示類別可以使用標記延伸提供的值，而且參考的處理常式使用標記延伸集作業。

trans-unit.source: Default implementation for a XAML object writer uses CLR reflection and this CLR attribute to determine if there is an intentional callback for markup extension usages that set values of a type or member.
trans-unit.target: XAML 物件寫入器的預設實作會使用 CLR 反映和這個 CLR 屬性來判斷是否有設定的型別或成員值的標記延伸使用方式的刻意回撥。

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Xaml.XamlServices> load or parse, or a <xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader> / <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriter> sequence, will use this attribute and invoke the named callback as part of the operation whenever writing the object node based on a markup extension usage.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Xaml.XamlServices>載入或剖析，或<xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader>/<xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriter>順序、 將會使用這個屬性和作業中叫用具名回撥，撰寫物件節點基礎的標記延伸使用方式時。</xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriter> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlServices>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XamlSetMarkupExtensionAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XamlSetMarkupExtensionAttribute"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The method referenced by name through the `xamlSetMarkupExtensionHandler` value should be based on a generic <xref:System.EventHandler%601> delegate with <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlSetMarkupExtensionEventArgs> event data constraint.
trans-unit.target: 透過名稱所參考方法`xamlSetMarkupExtensionHandler`值應該根據一般<xref:System.EventHandler%601>委派與<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlSetMarkupExtensionEventArgs>事件資料的條件約束。</xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlSetMarkupExtensionEventArgs> </xref:System.EventHandler%601>

trans-unit.source: The name of the handler to use for markup extension set operations.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用標記延伸的處理常式的名稱設定作業。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the handler to use for markup extension set operations.
trans-unit.target: 取得要使用標記延伸的處理常式的名稱設定作業。

trans-unit.source: The handler should be based on a generic <xref:System.EventHandler%601> delegate with <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlSetMarkupExtensionEventArgs> event data constraint.
trans-unit.target: 此處理常式應該根據一般<xref:System.EventHandler%601>委派與<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlSetMarkupExtensionEventArgs>事件資料的條件約束。</xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlSetMarkupExtensionEventArgs> </xref:System.EventHandler%601>

trans-unit.source: The name of the handler to use for markup extension set operations.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用標記延伸的處理常式的名稱設定作業。
